item.description:
**Please note** this month's event will not be on the typical third Sunday of the month due to Spring Break.

Date: April 13, 2008
Time: 1p.m.

Join CAPE Group on April 13 at Curvoflite, builder of custom spiral and circular stairs.

This is a wonderful opportunity to photograph a unique old woodworking shop with forms, and templates hanging on the walls. There are also hand-turning lathes, chisels, in-progress stairs, and more. If you're interested in photography apart from the usual landscapes and portraits, you won't want to miss this event!

The Cape Ann Lighthouse Event tentatively scheduled for April, has been moved to May. Please take a moment to update your rsvp for each event.
item.why: CAPE Group members are friendly, helpful, and engaging, not to mention a lot of fun! We have a mixture of experience, from professionals to novice.
item.name: Curvoflite Woodworking Shop
